name: @notcc/logic
description: NotCC, standing for Nice Optimal Terrific Cool Challenge, is a tile based game(WIP)

scripts.build-proto: pbjs -t json-module src/parsers/nccs.proto -o src/parsers/nccs.pb.js && pnpm build-proto-types
scripts.build-proto-types: pbjs -t static-module src/parsers/nccs.proto -o tmp_nccs.js && pbts -o src/parsers/nccs.pb.d.ts tmp_nccs.js;rm tmp_nccs.js
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf dist && pnpm build && pnpm copy-proto-files

author: G lander
